name: Hentai 2+2=4
description:
Hentai 2+2=4 - a logical game in which you need to solve mathematical examples and open pictures.

If you open the picture completely you can move to the next level.Features:
  • Simple controls (mouse)
  • Relaxing soundtrack.
  • Beautiful pictures.
  • 13 pictures.

Trading Cards: SOONCredits:
  • Programming: AFBIK Studio
  • Music and effects: zapsplat
